value-picks.title: Primebook 2 Pro 2025 (New Launch) | 8GB RAM, 128GB UFS Storage | 14.1-Inch FHD IPS Display | 14 Hours Battery | MediaTek Helio G99 | Android 15 (PrimeOS 3.0) | Backlit Keyboard | in-Built AI (Gray)

earbuds.title: OnePlus Nord Buds 3 TWS Earbuds
earbuds.description: ⭐ 4.5★ (2200+ reviews) — Best overall for everyday use. Active Noise Cancellation (ANC), crisp sound, long battery life & reliable voice calls. Great all-around pick for daily music, videos, and calls.

earbuds.title: realme Buds T200x
earbuds.description: ⭐ 4.3★ (300+ reviews) — Excellent balance of sound quality and battery life at mid-range budget. Well-reviewed for daily use and comfortable fit.

earbuds.title: realme Buds T200 Lite
earbuds.description: ⭐ 4.7★ (800+ reviews) — Superb value under ₹1,500. Strong driver performance, solid ANC-lite sound, and long playtime. One of the best budget earbuds available.

earbuds.title: EarSafe Lite Open Ear Air Conduction Headphones, Bluetooth V5.2, Dual Pairing, IPx5 Water-Resistant & sweatproof, 12h+ Battery Life for Workout, Sports, All Day Long Calls (2024 Model)
earbuds.description: Open-ear design — ideal for workouts & commuting (keeps you aware of surroundings). Good for non-isolating listening and safety during outdoor use.

earbuds.title: Goboult Z40 with Zen ENC Mic
earbuds.description: ⭐ 4.3★ (840+ reviews) — Great basic true wireless earbuds with long battery life & clear call quality thanks to ENC mic. Excellent everyday pick under ₹1,000.

earbuds.title: Compact Gaming Earbuds
earbuds.description: ⭐ 4.5★ (13+ reviews) — Well-rated compact earbuds with low latency. Good choice if you want gaming + music combo at a low price.

earbuds.title: Boat 2025 Launch Airdopes Plus 311, Glass Design, ENx Tech, 50 H Battery, Fast Charge, Stream Ad Free Music via App Support, Bluetooth Earbuds, TWS Ear Buds Wireless Earphones with mic (Charcoal Black)
earbuds.description: ⭐ 4.3★ (15+ reviews) — Solid daily use earbuds from a reliable brand. Comfy fit, good battery life, and dependable performance.

earbuds.title: amazon basics True Wireless in-Ear Earbuds with Mic, Low-Latency Gaming Mode, Touch Control, IPX5 Water-Resistance, Bluetooth 5.3, Up to 60 Hours Play Time, Voice Assistance and Fast Charging (White)
earbuds.description: Budget TWS with long battery life, IPX5 water resistance & low latency. Simple, practical choice for everyday listening on a budget.

speakers.title: JBL Flip 6 Wireless Portable Bluetooth Speaker Pro Sound
speakers.description: ⭐ 4.7/5 (15,000+ reviews) — Excellent powerful sound with deep bass, waterproof IP67, long battery life (~12 hrs). Great for home/outdoor parties.

speakers.title: JBL Flip 6 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
speakers.description: ⭐ 4.7/5 (popular price tier) — Compact but rich, punchy audio and rugged waterproof design. Great everyday speaker with premium quality.

speakers.title: boAt Signature Sound Speaker
speakers.description: ⭐ 4.7/5 (100+ reviews) — 160 W boAt Signature Sound, EQ modes, RGB LEDs, mic & guitar input, long playtime. Excellent for big gatherings/parties.

speakers.title: JBL Go 3, Wireless Ultra Portable Bluetooth Speaker, Pro Sound, Vibrant Colors with Rugged Fabric Design
speakers.description: ⭐ 4.8/5 (~27,000+ reviews) — Compact, vibrant sound, excellent clarity, waterproof design. One of the most popular portable speakers in India.

speakers.title: Compact Bluetooth Speaker
speakers.description: Compact & portable, modern Bluetooth v5.0, good daily performance — great budget speaker.

speakers.title: Portronics SoundDrum 1 TWS Portable Bluetooth Speaker
speakers.description: ⭐ 4.3/5 (entered reviews) — Great little speaker for music outdoors, travel, or desk use. Highly rated for the price.

speakers.title: boAt Stone 190 Pro 5W Bluetooth Speaker
speakers.description: ⭐ 4.8/5 (128+ reviews) — Super-portable pocket-friendly speaker with clear sound and respectable volume. Perfect for travel, bike rides, desk, or gifting.

smart-speakers.title: Echo Show 5 Smart Speaker
smart-speakers.description: A powerful smart display with Alexa for video calls, recipes, routines, and smart home control.

smart-home.title: Lifelong Smart Power Plug
